subject: Eclipse and jUnit -- how to modify launcher's classpath
msgSnippet: I am working with the jUnit plugin for Eclipse.   I can t figure out how to modify the runtime classpath for the launcher.   I am testing J2EE components and
messageBody:
I am working with the jUnit plugin for Eclipse.   I can't figure out how to modify the runtime classpath for the launcher.   I am testing J2EE components and need to be able to include various J2EE and application jar files to the Launcher's classpath.
 
Thanks for any help.
 
Gary Craig
Superlative Software Solutions, Inc.
